CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 事实；实际情况；真相；确凿性；客观事实；真实性；实情；证据；依据；不争的事实；已发生的事件；现实情况；具体情况；事项

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 派别；内讧；小集团；纪实小说

word_group.brief_definition: 事实；实际情况；事实问题
客观事实；无法改变的事实
纯粹的事实；不争的事实
生命的事实；生活的事实
简单事实；简单的事实；简单实际
发现事实；找出事实；事实调查

bilingual.source: In fact, I was a bit angry.
Newspapers often contain both fact and opinion.
bilingual.target: 报纸通常包含事实和观点。

bilingual.source: In fact, I was chosen to play the dance music.
bilingual.target: 事实上，我被选中播放舞曲。

bilingual.source: In fact, she's funnier than anyone I know.
bilingual.target: 事实上，她比我认识的任何人都更有趣。

bilingual.source: In fact, travelling by car is more dangerous than travelling by plane.
bilingual.target: 事实上，开车比坐飞机更危险。

bilingual.source: In fact, there were many other things there made in China.
bilingual.target: 事实上，还有很多其他东西是中国制造的。

bilingual.source: In fact, we stayed at the same campsite as we did ten years ago.
bilingual.target: 事实上，我们住在十年前的同一个营地。

bilingual.source: In fact, learning at home is very popular with a lot of people now.
bilingual.target: 事实上，现在很多人都很喜欢在家学习。

bilingual.source: What parts of the newspaper report are fact and which are opinion?
bilingual.target: 报纸报道的哪些部分是事实，哪些是观点？

bilingual.source: However, new research suggests that the story may be fiction instead of fact.
bilingual.target: 然而，新的研究表明这个故事可能是虚构的而非事实。

list.abstract: fact（英 [fækt]，美 [fækt]），英语单词，作名词为无可争辩的真实事情；事实；实际情况。短语搭配有as a matter of fact（事实上, 实际上）、in fact（事实上, 实际上）。例句为“In fact, Chinese traditional culture has always encouraged filial devotion to parents（事实上，中国传统文化一直鼓励孝敬父母）”。 fact相关近义词有truth、reality。
FACT函数用途：返回一个数的阶乘，即1*2*3*...*该数

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, I like the sound of that. Yeah!
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，我喜欢那种声音，耶！

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, I believe you encountered one yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，我相信你自己也曾经遇到过。

yingyinNormal.en: Childhood ain't so jolly. In fact, it's rather frightening. Agree?
yingyinNormal.zh: 并不愉快的童年，事实上，周遭环境也很可怕，是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Lockhart/Gardner. And, in fact, wasn't it Lockhart/Gardner who failed you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 洛&加律所。事实上，不正是他们搞砸了领养。

yingyinNormal.en: As a matter of fact, I have very happy memories of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上我对那家餐厅有很美好的回忆。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's a fact: my mom has ten, 15 years left at best.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实是：我妈最多只剩10到15年了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're wrong about the truth. There is objective truth. He killed her. You know it's a fact.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对真相的看法是错的。客观事实是存在的。他杀了她。你知道这是事实。

yingyinNormal.en: As a tax payer I'd like to lodge a complaint as a matter of fact.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上作为纳税人，我要投诉。

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. And, in fact, that area has been a region of very active wind development.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，那地方风能发展已经非常活跃。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, you're a Ground Floor Poster, Mr. Irvin. What does that mean?
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，你是一楼楼主，艾文先生，这是什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: That, FYI, was sarcasm. I, in fact, believe it is a big deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个，告诉你，是讽刺，事实上，我相信这是很大很大的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, they've been disappointing on everything you've written the past ten years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，你过去十年写的每一本书销量都不高。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone on this base, every one of you, is fighting for survival. That's a fact!
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个基地里的所有人都在为生存而战，这是个事实。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, you are. The fact that you don't think you are makes you even sexier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是呀，事实是，你不认为自己性感反而让你变得更性感了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a fact. Greenspan's wrong. I don't know how else you want me to say...
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是事实，格林斯潘是错的，我不知道你还想让我说什么…

yingyinNormal.en: And in fact, these stable orbits only exist in a three dimensional universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而事实上，这些稳定轨道只存在于三度空间所构成的宇宙。

yingyinNormal.en: You know I would stop you from doing that. You know that for a fact. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道有我你就成不了，你就这么确定这是既定事实么？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, there are hundreds of variations, or alleles, of BRCA1.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，它们之间有成百种差异，或者说，有成百种乳腺癌1号基因的等位基因。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, it's been a bright spot as we keep fighting to recover from the great recession.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，这一直是我们从大萧条中不断复苏过来的亮点。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Grant and Ms. Littlejohn, in fact, were members of the same off-campus club.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，格兰特先生和利特约翰女士是同一个校外俱乐部的会员。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 事实; 依据; 真相

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 事实的；真实的；确凿的
n. 类事实；短讯；短消息；无价值的信息

word_family.mean: n. 无可争辩的真实事情；事实；实际情况；真实性；…这一事实；依据；真相

sense_info_list.zh: 事实; 依据; 真相

examination_example.sentence: Worries about automation are in <highlight>fact</highlight> groundless.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对自动化的担忧实际上是没有根据的。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>fact</highlight>, "becoming more efficient" is part of the problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，“变得更有效率”是问题的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: Of even greater concern is the <highlight>fact</highlight> that obesity turns out to be very difficult to define.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更令人担忧的是，事实证明肥胖是很难定义的。

word_usage.usage:
fact作“事实”解时是可数名词，作“真实情况”解时，是不可数名词，还可引申为“论据；细节”等。fact后常接一个同位语从句构成“ the fact that……”结构。例：
I could no longer ignore the fact that he was deeply unhappy.
我再不能对他深感不快这个事实不闻不问了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 事实的；真实的；确凿的
n. 宗派；派别；小集团；纪实小说；纪实电影；内讧；内部意见分歧

word_family.mean: n. 无可争辩的真实事情；事实；实际情况；真实性；…这一事实；依据；真相

sense_info_list.en: a piece of information used as evidence or as part of a report or news article

examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个惊人的（但却是统计学上的）事实。

examination_example.sentence: Only cancer cells, in <highlight>fact</highlight>, are capable of dividing forever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，只有癌细胞才能永远分裂。

examination_example.sentence: When children are regarded as vessels to be filled with <highlight>facts</highlight>, creativity does not prosper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当孩子们被视为装满事实的容器时，创造力就不会得到发展。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 事实的；真实的；确凿的

word_family.mean: n. 无可争辩的真实事情；事实；实际情况；真实性；…这一事实；依据；真相

sense_info_list.en: a piece of information used as evidence or as part of a report or news article

examination_example.sentence: We originally had this suspicion back in 2016, puzzled by the <highlight>fact</highlight> that national statistics showed calorie consumption falling dramatically.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们最初在2016年就有了这种怀疑，对国家统计数据显示卡路里消费量大幅下降的事实感到困惑。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>fact</highlight>, many of us would choose pain over boredom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，我们中的许多人会选择痛苦而不是无聊。

examination_example.sentence: How does the women interpret the <highlight>fact</highlight> that the man was asked to help his colleges with their work?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女士们如何解释要求男士帮助他的学院工作的事实?

examination_example.sentence: It helps people to understand complex issues and to separate <highlight>fact</highlight> from fiction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它帮助人们理解复杂的问题，区分事实和虚构。

examination_example.sentence: The more recent steep climb in grain prices partly results from the <highlight>fact</highlight> that people want to consume meat products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近来谷物价格的急剧攀升，部分是由人们想要吃肉类产品这一现实情况导致的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 事实；实际情况；事实问题

sense_info_list.en: a piece of information used as evidence or as part of a report or news article

examination_example.sentence: A history book which may contain the <highlight>facts</highlight> in story form will be easier to read than one dealing with scientific subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一本可能以故事形式包含事实的历史书比一本涉及科学主题的历史书更容易阅读。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>fact</highlight>, the key to easy morning wake-up lies in resting your body clock A better plan for sleep can help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，早晨轻松醒来的关键在于让你的生物钟得到休息，一个更好的睡眠计划会有所帮助。

examination_example.sentence: As a matter of <highlight>fact</highlight>, I'm feeling a bit cold.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But in <highlight>fact</highlight>, you should start with the exercise on your feet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但事实上，你应该从你的脚开始锻炼。

examination_example.sentence: In the past, I always hid that <highlight>fact</highlight> and felt bad about it for days or even weeks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过去，我总是隐瞒这一事实，并为此感到难过好几天甚至几周。

examination_example.sentence: He took off his expensive watch to hide the <highlight>fact</highlight> that he was rich.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他摘下昂贵的手表，以掩盖他很富有的事实。
